data.text: Ka komar da mutane zuwa ƙura,
Ka share mutane cikin barcin mutuwa;
ko da yake da safe takan yi sabuwar huda
An cinye mu ta wurin fushinka
Dukan kwanakinmu sun wuce ƙarƙashin fushinka;
Ka koya mana yawan kwanakinmu daidai,
Ka ji mu, ya Ubangiji! Har yaushe zai ci gaba?
Ka ƙosar da mu da safe da ƙaunarka marar ƙarewa,
Faranta mana zuciya kamar yawan kwanakin da muka sha azaba,
Bari a nuna ayyukanka ga bayinka,
Bari alherin shugabanmu Allah yă kasance a kanmu;
